channel.title: [PI] Some help needed
channel.description:
My base is Project Insanity. I have a couple of questions to ask:
[b]PROBLEM 1:[/b] How to make it like Skillcapes only appear in shop if you get 99 in that skill?
[b]PROBLEM 2:[/b] NPCs are not dropping anything, how to make like they start dropping items. I have done all work in NPCDrops.TSM. Its done right. I think its important for you to know that the source is MTP V2 -by marcbob. Hope you know how to?
[b]PROBLEM 3:[/b] How can I make a voting system which requires no MySQL. I want it like some one votes for server and when they do ::claim, they get cash only if they have voted in a particular site or any way for that.
Please answer in the format... problem 1:.. problem 2:..
Hope someone helps me.

item.title: [PI] Some help needed
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

1; use an if-statement to check the player’s levels.
If the player has a 99, add the skill cape to the shop in ShopAssistant.

2; not sure. I’ve never used MTP.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Some help needed
item.dc:creator: @Sagi Sagi
item.description:
@Sagi wrote:

Any solutions for Problem 1 & 2 ??

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Some help needed
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

For number three, you will need MySQL, or some other type of data store, to check who votes.
Otherwise, they can just claim after loading the page, or anyone else votes.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Some help needed

item.description:
@Sagi wrote:

My base is Project Insanity. I have a couple of questions to ask:

PROBLEM 1: How to make it like Skillcapes only appear in shop if you get 99 in that skill?

PROBLEM 2: NPCs are not dropping anything, how to make like they start dropping items. I have done all work in NPCDrops.TSM. Its done right. I think its important for you to know that the source is MTP V2 -by marcbob. Hope you know how to?

PROBLEM 3: How can I make a voting system which requires no MySQL. I want it like some one votes for server and when they do ::claim, they get cash only if they have voted in a particular site or any way for that.
